abstract: The Obama administration wants Federal Reserve oversight, but the banks say their survival is at stake.
snippet: The Obama administration wants Federal Reserve oversight, but the banks say their survival is at stake.
lead_paragraph: SALT LAKE CITY  Generations ago, industrialists and financiers extracted fortunes from the copper and gold mines dug into the canyons near here. Now, their modern-day counterparts are resisting a government proposal that could shut down what has become another gold mine of sorts.

headline.main: Citing Risks, U.S. Seeks New Rules for Niche Banks
headline.print_headline: Citing Risks, U.S. Seeks New Rules For Niche Banks

abstract: The parent of American Airlines said Thursday that it had secured $2.9 billion in additional liquidity by agreeing to sell its frequent-flier program to Citigroup and through new loans and a sale-leaseback agreement with a unit of General Electric.
snippet: The parent of American Airlines said Thursday that it had secured $2.9 billion in additional liquidity by agreeing to sell its frequent-flier program to Citigroup and through new loans and a sale-leaseback agreement with a unit of General Electric...
lead_paragraph: Updated with C.E.O. letter, stock reaction, correction | 10:51 a.m.

headline.main: AMR Gets $2.9 Billion in New Liquidity
